product_name: GU Recovery Brew Drink Mix - Canister
long_description: This canister of GU Recovery Brew(TM) drink mix helps you replenish energy and rebuild muscles after an intense workout. This canister of Gu Recovery Brew contains whey protein isolate and amino acids arginine and glutamine to promote recovery and support the immune system. Simple and complex carbohydrates refuel your energy levels so you can get back to training. Contains over 100% of the daily allowances of vitamins C and E in every serving. Drink 16 - 24 fl. oz. of GU Recovery Brew after your workout to replenish energy and rebuild muscles. Fill 16 fl. oz. bottle halfway with water, add Recovery Brew mix, shake bottle vigorously for 20 sec, add remaining 8 fl. oz. of water, shake bottle vigorously and enjoy. 30 oz. container holds 14 servings of Gu Recovery Brew mix. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This canister of GU Recovery Brew(TM) drink mix helps you replenish energy and rebuild muscles after an intense workout.
